alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Gulf, southwestern Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties through 530 PM EDT/430 PM CDT/... At 449 PM EDT/349 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles east of Stonemill Creek to 6 miles north of Apalachicola. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apalachicola, Buck Siding, Odena, Tilton, Beverly, Owens Bridge, White City, Kern, Wilma, Bay City, Sumatra, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Twin Pole, Creels, Hays Place, Dalkeith and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
